description: DESERT EVE YELLOW yarrow is a showy perennial that stands out in any garden. It makes an excellent border, and its deep yellow daisy-like flowers can be a treat for both the senses and the garden. Its long-lasting blooms stay bright and cheerful from the midsummer to the first hard frost. Its heart-shaped evergreen foliage makes a great backdrop for any landscape. This drought-tolerant plant is ideal for sunny spots and is resistant to deer. It can also be used as cut flowers, as the blooms last a few days in water. DESERT EVE YELLOW yarrow is an essential addition to any flowerbed or border.
